channel.title: Equipment and Items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Equipment and Items"

item.title: Re: Equipment and Items
item.content:encoded: Absolutely awesome, thank you so much for the fast and kind response. If me or my group notices anything I'll be sure to post about it.

item.title: Re: Equipment and Items
item.content:encoded:
Thanks for the suggestion! I honestly didn't realize we didn't have descriptions of the equipment packs until reading this, and they should definitely be included. As such, I've reformatted the Adventuring Gear page (which you can normally find under the Items tab on the front page) to include the contents of the different equipment packs available, as well as adding descriptions to items from the PHB where applicable.

Let us know if there's other things you'd like to see on the wiki!

item.title: Equipment and Items
item.content:encoded: Hello, new user here love how usefully this page is. I was wondering if tables and descriptions will be added for equipment. For example some classes start with a "dungeoneerâ€™s pack", but there's no table or description about what's in that pack. Sure it's easy to google, but just wondering if that'll be something to get added?
